name: Masyu Infinite
description:
Masyu Infinite offers unlimited enjoyment of the classic logic puzzle with a generator and a free daily puzzle

Features:
-A puzzle generator that provides new puzzles on demand, with three difficulty levels, from size 5x5 to 18x18
-A daily puzzle going from an easy 18x10 on Mondays to a hard 36x20 on Sundays
-Zoomable and draggable playing grid
-Autodetection of solving errors and puzzle completion
-Autosave of progress on all puzzles
-No microtransactions, no ads, no social media integration, no scoring system, nothing but unlimited masyus waiting to be solved
